title: Hextech protobelt or glp on warwick ??

replies.body:
Neither.
He's an AD champion, with one ability that scales with AP, and badly at that.

He scales badly full stop, if he builds damage items he is too squishy to get the enemy low enough to kill, he builds attackspeed it goes to waste on his w, but if he doesnt build damage or attackspeed he cant get them low enough for his w to activate, but if he builds tanky he wont have the damage to get his w working and his sustain would then be shitty. ww needs the perfect balance of tank and damage to be able to work, which is extremely rare.
